workflows.description: Required. The build-trigger.yaml need a workflow...

name.description: Optional. Recommended for describing the workflow.

triggerRules.description: Optional. Used to specify that the workflow should be triggered at check-in. If not specified, the workflow will not be trigged at all.

branchFilter.description: Optional. Not implemented yet. Planned use to specify the git-branch trigging sould react on. If not specified, the default branch will be used.

includes.description: Optional. Used to specify changes to be reacted to. If empty list or unspecfied, the workflow will be trigged by all changes.

excludes.description: Optional. Used to specify changes that should not be reacted to.

BuildTrigger.TriggerRules.title: TriggerRules
BuildTrigger.TriggerRules.description: Used to specify changes to be reacted to. If empty list, the workflow will be trigged by all changes.

includes.description: Optional. Used to specify the git-branch to be reacted to. If empty list or unspecfied, the workflow will be trigged only by changes in default-branch.

excludes.description: Optional. Used to specify git-branch that should not be reacted to.

BuildTrigger.BranchFilter.title: BranchFilter
BuildTrigger.BranchFilter.description: Not implemented yet. Planned use is to specify git-branches to be reacted to. If empty list, the workflow will be trigged only by changes in default-branch.
